tweets.content:
Great write-up from @kaiynne about his superapp thesis and how he plans to win that game with Infinex.

After years of empty narratives, real revenue has finally become cryptoâ€™s defining meta. Some might call it ridiculous to even call that a â€œmeta,â€ but itâ€™s good to see the space finally waking up to the fact that productivity and cash flow are what truly matter.

Better late than never.

CEXs have shown for a decade now whatâ€™s possible, but now itâ€™s time for onchain protocols to catch up.

This was my thesis from day one, when Moonrock came in as one of the earliest backers almost 1.5 years ago.

Infinex is building the first true onchain superapp, with perps powered by Hyperliquid, swaps, yield, games, NFTs, and prediction markets all slowly but surely coming together - the vision is turning into reality.

A full CEX experience, minus the custodial risk.

Once weâ€™re there, the playbook is simple:

generate revenue â†’ diversify streams â†’ double down on what users want most â†’ generate even more revenue â†’ TGE â†’ buy back â†’ return value to users.

The revenue wars have just begun. Also with CEXs getting more FUD than ever, people are finally realizing they need real alternatives.

Infinex is here to win both of these races.

tweets.content:
Picked up another 10 Infinex Patrons over the past week through some lowball bids that impatient mayo hands dumped into.

Not sure why you guys hate money, but thanks I guess.

Itâ€™s slowly but surely becoming my biggest bag in the portfolio. I honestly donâ€™t get how people are still sidelined here, this opportunity is a blessing.

Let me explain why:

The next 3â€“6 months are shaping up to be max bullish and risk-on. Projects that will generate the most momentum and attention will also be the biggest winners.

This will happen through a series of fundamental upgrades for Infinex that are about to roll out, the result of 6â€“12 months of hard work behind the scenes:

- Infinex Predict
- Infinex NFT
- Infinex Perps / Hyperliquid integration
- Native $SUI support
- Infinex browser extension
- Fiat on-ramp

Combine that with the following catalysts:

- Retail is coming, hence a wave of new users Infinex can capture

- DeFi will thrive in up-only conditions as activity, volume & fees turn reflexive

- From @kaiynne podcasts/interviews, itâ€™s clear their TGE is still coming this year, so expecting a big marketing push and momentum ramp-up

There are a ton more reasons Iâ€™m bullish on Infinex as the main DeFi play, but Iâ€™ll leave it here before this turns into a novel.

So yeah, screenshot this and keep dumping your Patron NFTs at ridiculous prices. Weâ€™ll keep buying them.

Winning isnâ€™t for everyone.

YapRun Season 1 has wrapped up.

Real Infinex users were rewarded for great, creative, innovative and original content during the season.  

The community was dropped over 1.5m uPatrons valued at almost 1 million $USD in total value. ğŸ‘€

But who are they? and what did they say about their drop?

ğŸ§µğŸ‘‡
tweets.author: infinex

tweets.content:
Thereâ€™s one sentence here that stood out to me and here are my thoughts on it:

â€œThe timeline was overwhelmed by low-quality content. Bots destroyed the network effects of legitimate content creators.â€

This is a very interesting observation.

Not long ago, when my favorite creators spoke about an ecosystem, it would push me to genuinely explore further.

But now that I think about it, itâ€™s been a while since Iâ€™ve studied an ecosystem deeply.

Those same creators I used to pause for and study their content and breakdowns, I now skip.

And thatâ€™s because what appeared back then as authentic interest has become incentivized shilling.

tweets.content:
Yaprun needs a reset.

What started as artisanal, farm-to-table content has devolved into industrialized slop. We've seen a substantial increase in low-effort content over the course of the season. Copy-paste threads, bot-like behavior, and spam that dilutes the aim of Yaprun: building the Infinex community.

For transparency, we'll be breaking down the review process once complete, showing exactly what content we valued, and what content we didn't.

@kaiynne will share more on this on X, look out for that next week ğŸ‘€

tweets.content:
What is Infinex Connect?

Connect lets you use your Infinex Account like a connected wallet with external apps - only much better.

â†’ One-click auto connect
â†’ Clear signing prompts, with granular controls
â†’ Take your portfolio with you with swidge built-in
â†’ Support for multi-chain apps (no more chain switching)
â†’ and more...

Check out â†’ infinex.xyz/connect
tweets.author: infinex

tweets.content:

â†’ Auto-connect from the "Apps" page

â†’ Stake SNX and sUSD in the @synthetix_io 420 pool

For more details about this alpha release, head over to â†’ infinex.xyz/changelog/infineâ€¦
